notepad

Class SimpleNotepad

  • java.lang.Object
    • notepad.SimpleNotepad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Notepad

    public class SimpleNotepad
extends java.lang.Object
implements Notepad
    Class for saving data of Note typeNote with methods addNote deleteNote editNote showNotes Implements Notepad Notepad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleNotepad()
      Create new instance of Notepad with Dynamic size
      SimpleNotepad(int size)
      Create static Notepad

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNote(Note newNote)
      Add note to notepad Throw NotepadOverflowException if notepad is static and all notes are filled
      void deleteNote(int index)
      Delete note at the position Throw NotepadOutOfBoundsException if index for deleting out of notepad
      void editNote(int index, Note note)
      Replace new note on place of index note Throw NotepadOutOfBoundsException if index for replacing out of notepad
      void showNotes(java.io.PrintStream outputStream)
      Output the structure of notepad (notes) into Stream
